title: Are gifts stil being given out
body: I still didnt get my gift on both my accounts did riot forget some people or something?{{summoner:31}}

replies.body:
For the players that we've missed, we're manually adding the gifts if you reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Let me know if you have any questions.
